document_data.name: Seranolla
document_data.mainbody: '''Seranolla the Whisperer''' was a [[forest gnome]] priestess of [[Mielikki]] and an agent of the [[Emerald Enclave]] in the [[Moonsea]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/The Occupation of Szith Morcane|6}}
document_data.History:
''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Seranolla was in [[Elventree]], where she possibly hired some [[adventurer]]s to help [[Elanil Elassidil]] with some [[drow]] arriving on the surface.

Seranolla was possibly involved in the case of [[dracolich]]es and [[ghost ship]]s roaming the [[Moonsea]] in the {{yearlinkName|1489}}. She said that the Enclave was concerned about strange changes in the weather.{{Cite adventurers league/Shadows over the Moonsea|10-11}}
document_data.Relationship: Seranolla was sister of [[Serinia]] and [[Yavendel]].{{Cite adventurers league/Reclamation of Phlan|124}}
